title: Why do artists lip-sync, and how do they get away with it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Easy question some artist lip-sync a lot and some lip-sync less. They do that because during live singing you need a lot of stamina and there are higher chances of voice cracks, which you know k-netz won’t be accepting that any time soon lol Next sometimes singing live can be almost impossible especially during live broadcasts on television etc. One good example of a group that lip syncs quite often can be Twice The last getting away part depends sometimes if the artist is sick they can get away with it, if they lack stamina they can get away with it and in kpop the artists do what their companies say like lip-sync
